trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented, defines an animation segment with its own target value and interpolation method for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.

Int32KeyFrame is an abstract class that defines <xref:System.Int32> value type key frames for several different techniques of key frame animation: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineInt32KeyFrame>.

To animate a <xref:System.Int32> value with key frames, you define a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames> animation, and populate its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> property with one or more elements that define the key frames.
For XAML syntaxes that take a Int32KeyFrame, you need to specify a non-abstract derived type of Int32KeyFrame as an object element.

For details, see the XAML syntax on the reference pages for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineInt32KeyFrame>.
## XAML Text Usage See Remarks
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> class that has the specified target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> instance.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> class that has the specified target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> instance.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> instance.
Returns the interpolated value of a specific key frame at the progress increment provided.
The base value is typically the initial value of the property being animated or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrame.Value%2A> of the previous key frame.
Most implementations will return the value of `baseValue` when `keyFrameProgress` is 0.0.
The value to animate from.
A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
Occurs if keyFrameProgress is not between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive.
Calculates the value of a key frame at the progress increment provided.
The value to animate from; typically the value of the previous key frame.
A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
Gets or sets the time at which the key frame's target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> should be reached.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

The time at which the key frame's current value should be equal to its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> property. The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform*>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*> dependency property.
To be added.
See <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrame.Value*>.
To be added.
Gets or sets the key frame's target value.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The key frame's target value, which is the value of this key frame at its specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*>.
The default value is `0`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> dependency property.
To be added.
